title: Set classpath / output location should be combined into one operation
OB: When pressing Ok after setting the output location, the following error message is displayed: 'Cannot nest output folder /xy in source folder /xy/src'. It seems that setting the output location and classpath are two separate operations, but setting the output location first creates an illegal state.
EB: To address this issue, setting the classpath and output location should be offered as a single operation, similar to the validation process that checks both the classpath and output location simultaneously. Additionally, the error message should be improved to display: '/xy/src' cannot be nested in '/xy'.
